item.title: GCOG: Hit the Nazi Retrieve the Ark one-shot
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Professor Ernesto Goldman investigates ‘something mysterious’ beneath New Gauntlet City and Ace Reporter Rosy Strand wants the scoop, while Violet ‘Eagle Eyes’ Parker, the Sharpshooter and Jack Flint the Inventor are also brought in by SAEON.
‘Torpedo Joe’ Hains intervenes but our heroes rescue Orville Wilson the site engineer and archaeologist Anna Griffith despite a weakening in the fabric of space-time! There’s long dead Hanging Judge Jenkins, a secret lab beneath the City, and a way out that turns out to be a way through, instead. Then … a Nazi glacier base, betrayal, and nemeses old and nemeses new … before a daring zeppelin escape … and a pterodactyl …

Read full topic
item.source: GCOG: Hit the Nazi Retrieve the Ark one-shot
